item.title: My skill code not working?
item.dc:creator: @HcoJustin HcoJustin
item.description:
@HcoJustin wrote:

17 is the skill id, which is probably thieving. You need to change xpGain to change the amount of xp

item.title: My skill code not working?
item.dc:creator: @geowayne geowayne
item.description:
@geowayne wrote:

My thieving works but how come when i changed my exp rate to where i can get more experience it doesn’t work
the code is;

					player.getActionAssistant().sendMessage("You steal from the stall " + recMessage);
					player.getActionAssistant().addSkillXP(xpGain, 17);
					player.getActionAssistant().addItem(item, itemAmount);
					player.getActionAssistant().refreshSkill(17);

player.getActionAssistant().addSkillXP(xpGain, 17);

***changed the 17 to 10,000

i was unable to gain xp, and given the message “your busy you can’t do that now”

any tip? thanks!

i did this to my other skills and it worked perfectly fine, but somehow this doesnt work on this skill.

Read full topic
